summary: Completed comprehensive testing of freemium gating strategy implementation. Backend auth endpoints working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend auth modal and forms properly implemented with all required fields. Core freemium functionality verified - unauthenticated users see preview content while detailed sections are gated behind registration.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts pointer events making tab switching difficult
ui_bugs.workaround: Keyboard navigation (Escape) works to close modal

passed_tests: Backend API health check (/api/)
Backend auth registration endpoint (POST /api/auth/register)
Backend auth login endpoint (POST /api/auth/login/email)
Backend current user endpoint (GET /api/auth/me)
Backend report generation with auth (returns report_id)
Backend authenticated report retrieval (GET /api/reports/{id} with is_authenticated=true)
Backend unauthenticated report retrieval (GET /api/reports/{id} with is_authenticated=false)
Backend logout endpoint (POST /api/auth/logout)
Frontend landing page loads with Sign In button
Frontend auth modal opens with correct structure
Frontend auth modal has Sign In and Register tabs
Frontend registration form has all required fields (name, email, password, confirm password)
Frontend registration form has Create Account button
Frontend registration form has Google Sign-up option
Frontend auth modal displays proper branding and messaging
Frontend form validation placeholders are correct
Report generation endpoint returns report_id in response
Database integration for saving reports with report_id
Session management with cookies
Password hashing with bcrypt
Email validation in registration
Authentication state checking in report endpoint
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: AuthModal overlay is intercepting pointer events making tab switching difficult. Consider adding z-index management or pointer-events CSS adjustments to improve modal interaction. Core functionality is working correctly.
